Vigilance, ward {2}
When another creature you control deals combat damage to a player place a grail counter on it.
{U}: Creatures with grail counters on them gains hexproof until the end of the turn.
{R}: Creatures with grail counters on them get +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
{W}:  Creatures with grail counters on them gains indestructible until the end of the turn.
